name: PayStand.com
description: PayStand is a next generation payment & eCommerce checkout system that enables any organization to receive money in their Website, Social Network, or Web Application without transaction costs. We are the first multi-payment gateway that accepts credit cards (Visa/MasterCard/Amex/Discover), eCheck (ACH/Dwolla), and eCash (Bitcoins) with 0% transaction fees.
